src:
"Газпром" потратил государственные субсидии на выплату премий
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by TurboDIMA
After choosing profits over maintenance, California utility giant forces blackouts on customersPG&E diverted public funds towards executive bonuses and underspent bond money. Now, citizens pay the pricewww.salon.com
...топ–менеджменту, а по итогу часть населения будет сидеть без газа. Недолго — дней по 5 всего лишь.Придется потерпеть.
text:
Gazprom spent state subsidies on premium payments
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by TurboDIMA
After choosing profits over maintenance, California utility giant forces blackouts on customersPG & E diverted public funds towards executive bonuses and underspent bond money. Now, citizens pay the pricewww.salon.com
... to top management, and as a result, part of the population will sit without gas. Not for long - only 5 days. I have to endure.
